author: simonetripodi
msg: trivial: added XML header, code format

author: rhuijben
msg: Resolve a slight regression in libsvn_client by stopping to use svn:ignore on
the first existing ancestor directory as the ignores on the directory itself.
We introduced this with the inherited property work, but the libsvn_wc
function we originally used here, now handles all ignores cases properly.
(add_dir_recursive): Add result pool. Use svn_wc_get_ignores2() after adding
as that properly obtains all svn:ignore and svn:global-ignores patterns.

author: simonetripodi
msg: updated Ant build descriptor, re-generated via maven-ant-plugin
